trans-unit.source: Select the library to use for image I/O. The two possible values are "GraphicsMagick" (default) or "ImageMagick".

trans-unit.source: Select the n-th smallest element of a vector, using the ordering defined by sort.
trans-unit.target: 使用 sort 定义的顺序，选择向量的第n个最小元素。

trans-unit.source: Select which solver to use. If the problem is a MIP problem this flag will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 选择要使用的求解器。如果问题是MIP问题,这个标志将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Self-contained Octave scripts are useful when you want to write a program which users can invoke without knowing that the program is written in the Octave language. Octave scripts are also used for batch processing of data files. Once an algorithm has been developed and tested in the interactive portion of Octave, it can be committed to an executable script and used again and again on new data files.
trans-unit.target: 当你想编写一个程序,让用户在不知道程序是用Octave语言编写的情况下就可以调用时,自带的Octave脚本就很有用。Octave脚本也可用于数据文件的批量处理。一旦一个算法被开发出来并在Octave的交互部分进行了测试,它就可以被提交到一个可执行脚本中,并在新的数据文件中反复使用。

trans-unit.source: Send an explanation with your changes of what problem they fix or what improvement they bring about. For a bug fix, just include a copy of the bug report, and explain why the change fixes the bug.
trans-unit.target: 在发送您的修改时,请解释它们修复了什么问题或带来了什么改进。对于错误修复,只需附上一份错误报告的副本,并解释为什么该变更修复了错误。

trans-unit.source: Set this option to a nonzero value to display detailed information about the initial condition calculation (default is 0).
trans-unit.target: 将该选项设置为非零值,可显示初始条件计算的详细信息(默认为0)。

trans-unit.source: Set to a nonzero value to disable the linesearch algorithm (default is 0).
trans-unit.target: 设置为非零值,以禁用行搜索算法(默认为0)。

trans-unit.source: Set to a nonzero value to exclude algebraic variables from the error test. You must also set the "algebraic variables" option to declare which variables in the problem are algebraic (default is 0).
trans-unit.target: 设置为非零值可从错误测试中排除代数变量。您还必须设置 "algebraic variables" 选项，以声明问题中的哪些变量是代数的（默认为0）。

trans-unit.source: Set to a nonzero value to use the initial condition heuristics options described below.
trans-unit.target: 设置为非零值,以使用下面描述的初始条件启发式选项。

trans-unit.source: Set to one of the following values to enforce the inequality constraints specified by the "inequality constraint types" option (default is 0).
trans-unit.target: 设置为以下值之一以强制执行由 "inequality constraint types" 选项指定的不平等约束（默认为0）。

trans-unit.source: Set whether a structure can be passed to the function instead of parameter/value pairs. Defaults to true.

trans-unit.source: Set whether an error should be given for non-defined arguments. Defaults to false. If set to true, the extra arguments can be accessed through Unmatched after the parse method. Note that since Switch and Parameter arguments can be mixed, it is not possible to know the unmatched type. If argument is found unmatched it is assumed to be of the Parameter type and it is expected to be followed by a value.
trans-unit.target: 设置是否应为未定义的参数提供错误。默认为false。如果设置为true，则可以在 parse 方法之后通过 Unmatched 访问额外的参数。请注意，由于可以将 Switch 和 Parameter 参数混合使用，因此无法知道不匹配的类型。如果发现参数不匹配，则假定该 Parameter 属于Parameter类型，并且期望后面跟一个值。

trans-unit.source: Set whether matching of argument names should be case sensitive. Defaults to false.

trans-unit.source: Several features have to be added in future versions of Octave to be fully compatible to MATLAB. An overview of what is missing can be found at https://wiki.octave.org/Classdef.
trans-unit.target: 为了与MATLAB完全兼容，在将来的Octave版本中必须添加一些功能。缺少的内容的概述可以在https://wiki.octave.org/Classdef上找到。

trans-unit.source: Several functions are available to reorder depending on the type of the matrix to be factorized. If the matrix is symmetric positive-definite, then symamd or csymamd should be used. Otherwise amd, colamd or ccolamd should be used. For completeness the reordering functions colperm and randperm are also available.
trans-unit.target: 根据要分解的矩阵的类型，可以使用几个函数重新排序。如果矩阵是对称正定的，则应使用symamd或csymamd。否则，应使用amd，colamd或ccolamd。为了完整起见，还提供了colperm和randperm重新排序功能。

trans-unit.source: Several utility functions make it possible to store private data for use with a GUI which will not pollute the user’s variable space.
trans-unit.target: 几个实用程序功能可以存储私有数据以供GUI使用，而不会污染用户的可变空间。

trans-unit.source: Since Octave is Free Software users are encouraged to share their programs with others. To aid this sharing Octave supports the installation of extra packages. The ‘Octave Forge’ project is a community-maintained set of packages that can be downloaded and installed in Octave. At the time of writing the ‘Octave Forge’ project can be found online at https://octave.sourceforge.io, but since the Internet is an ever-changing place this may not be true at the time of reading. Therefore it is recommended to see the Octave website for an updated reference.
trans-unit.target: 由于Octave是免费软件，因此鼓励用户与他人共享他们的程序。为了帮助进行这种共享，Octave支持安装额外的软件包。“ Octave Forge”项目是一组社区维护的软件包，可以下载并安装在Octave中。在撰写本文时，可以在https://octave.sourceforge.io上在线找到“ Octave Forge”项目，但是由于Internet是一个日新月异的地方，因此在阅读时可能并非如此。因此，建议访问Octave网站以获取更新的参考。

trans-unit.source: Since an error can occur during the evaluation of a program, it is very convenient to be able to detect that an error occurred, so that the error can be fixed. This is possible with the try statement described in The try Statement.

trans-unit.source: Since an image is basically a matrix, Octave is a very powerful environment for processing and analyzing images. To illustrate how easy it is to do image processing in Octave, the following example will load an image, smooth it by a 5-by-5 averaging filter, and compute the gradient of the smoothed image.
trans-unit.target: 由于图像基本上是一个矩阵,所以Octave是一个非常强大的处理和分析图像的环境。为了说明在Octave中进行图像处理是多么的简单,下面的例子将加载一幅图像,用5乘5的平均滤波器对其进行平滑处理,并计算平滑后图像的梯度。

trans-unit.source: Since having this variable in memory might slow down other computations, it can be necessary to remove it manually from memory. The clear or clearvars functions do this.
trans-unit.target: 由于将此变量存储在内存中可能会减慢其他计算的速度，因此可能有必要从内存中手动将其删除。在 clear 或 clearvars 功能做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Since it is common to use errors when there is something wrong with the input to a function, Octave supports functions to simplify such code. When the print_usage function is called, it reads the help text of the function calling print_usage, and presents a useful error. If the help text is written in Texinfo it is possible to present an error message that only contains the function prototypes as described by the @deftypefn parts of the help text. When the help text isn’t written in Texinfo, the error message contains the entire help message.
trans-unit.target: 由于在函数的输入有问题时通常会使用错误，因此Octave支持函数以简化此类代码。当 print_usage 函数被调用时，它读取函数调用的帮助文本 print_usage ，并提出了一个有用的错误。如果帮助文本是用Texinfo编写的，则可能会显示一条错误消息，其中仅包含函数原型，如帮助文本的 @deftypefn 部分所述。当不在Texinfo中编写帮助文本时，错误消息将包含整个帮助消息。

trans-unit.source: Since many of Octave’s functions use these functions, it is also useful to understand them, so that errors and warnings can be handled.
trans-unit.target: 由于Octave的许多功能都使用了这些功能，因此理解它们也很有用，因此可以处理错误和警告。

trans-unit.source: Since the type of a variable may change during the execution of a program, it can be necessary to do type checking at run-time. Doing this also allows you to change the behavior of a function depending on the type of the input. As an example, this naive implementation of abs returns the absolute value of the input if it is a real number, and the length of the input if it is a complex number.
trans-unit.target: 由于变量的类型可能在程序执行期间发生变化，因此可能有必要在运行时进行类型检查。这样做还允许您根据输入的类型来更改功能的行为。例如，此 abs 的简单实现如果是实数则返回输入的绝对值，如果是复数则返回输入的长度。

trans-unit.source: Some file formats, such as TIFF and GIF, are able to store multiple images in a single file. <var>idx</var> can be a scalar or vector specifying the index of the images to read. By default, Octave will read only the first page.
trans-unit.target: 某些文件格式（例如TIFF和GIF）能够在单个文件中存储多个图像。 <var>idx</var> 可以是标量或向量，指定要读取的图像的索引。默认情况下，八度仅读取第一页。

trans-unit.source: Some file formats, such as TIFF and GIF, are able to store multiple images in a single file. This option specifies if img should be appended to the file (if it exists) or if a new file should be created for it (possibly overwriting an existing file). The value should be the string "Overwrite" (default), or "Append".
trans-unit.target: 某些文件格式（例如TIFF和GIF）能够在一个文件中存储多个图像。此选项指定是否应将 img 附加到文件（如果存在）或是否应为其创建新文件（可能覆盖现有文件）。该值应为字符串 "Overwrite" （默认）或 "Append" 。

trans-unit.source: Some of Octave’s functions are implemented in terms of functions that cannot be called recursively. For example, the ODE solver lsode is ultimately implemented in a Fortran subroutine that cannot be called recursively, so lsode should not be called either directly or indirectly from within the user-supplied function that lsode requires. Doing so will result in an error.
trans-unit.target: Octave的某些功能是根据无法递归调用的功能实现的。例如，ODE求解 lsode 在Fortran子程序不能被递归调用最终实现的，所以 lsode 不应被直接或间接地从该用户提供的函数内称为 lsode 需要。这样做会导致错误。

trans-unit.target: 一些Fortran子程序可能无法与旧版本的Sun Fortran编译器一起编译。如果你得到的错误,如

trans-unit.source: Some of the built-in functions take a variable number of arguments, depending on the particular usage, and their behavior is different depending on the number of arguments supplied.
trans-unit.target: 有些内置函数根据具体的使用情况,接受的参数数量是不固定的,根据提供的参数数量不同,它们的行为也不同。

trans-unit.target: 哈达玛德矩阵的一些特性是:

trans-unit.source: Some of these problems are due to bugs in other software, some are missing features that are too much work to add, and some are places where people’s opinions differ as to what is best.
trans-unit.target: 这些问题中的一些是由于其他软件的错误所致，有些是缺少功能而又无法添加的功能，还有一些是人们对最佳方法有不同意见的地方。

trans-unit.source: Some other built-in functions can also return permutation matrices. Examples include inv or lu.
trans-unit.target: 其他一些内置函数也可以返回置换矩阵。示例包括inv或lu。

trans-unit.source: Some output may appear to be incorrect when it is in fact due to a program whose behavior is undefined, which happened by chance to give the desired results on another system. For example, the range operator may produce different results because of differences in the way floating point arithmetic is handled on various systems.
trans-unit.target: 有些输出可能看起来不正确,但实际上是由于一个程序的行为没有定义,偶然在另一个系统上给出了所需的结果。例如,范围运算符可能会产生不同的结果,因为在不同系统上处理浮点运算的方式不同。

trans-unit.source: Some people have reported that calls to system() and the pager do not work on SunOS systems. This is apparently due to having G_HAVE_SYS_WAIT defined to be 0 instead of 1 when compiling libg++.
trans-unit.target: 有人报告说，对system（）和寻呼机的调用在SunOS系统上不起作用。这显然是由于在编译 libg++ 时将 G_HAVE_SYS_WAIT 定义为0而不是1 。

trans-unit.source: Some transmission channels can not accept binary data. It is customary to encode binary data in Base64 for transmission and to decode the data upon reception.
trans-unit.target: 有些传输通道不能接受二进制数据。习惯上,二进制数据在传输时用Base64编码,接收时再进行解码。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes csymamd works well for symmetric indefinite matrices too. The matrix S is assumed to be symmetric; only the strictly lower triangular part is referenced. S must be square. The ordering is followed by an elimination tree post-ordering.
trans-unit.target: 有时 csymamd 也适用于对称不定矩阵。假设矩阵 S 是对称的；仅引用严格的下部三角形部分。 S 必须是正方形。排序之后是消除树后排序。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes symamd works well for symmetric indefinite matrices too. The matrix S is assumed to be symmetric; only the strictly lower triangular part is referenced. S must be square.
trans-unit.target: 有时 symamd 也适用于对称不定矩阵。假设矩阵 S 是对称的；仅引用严格的下部三角形部分。 S 必须是正方形。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes during development there is a test that should work but is known to fail. You still want to leave the test in because when the final code is ready the test should pass, but you may not be able to fix it immediately. To avoid unnecessary bug reports for these known failures, mark the block with xtest rather than test:
trans-unit.target: 有时，在开发过程中会有一项测试应该有效但已知会失败。您仍然希望保留测试，因为当最终代码准备就绪时，测试应该可以通过，但是您可能无法立即对其进行修复。为了避免针对这些已知故障的不必要的错误报告，请使用 xtest 而不是 test 标记该块：

trans-unit.target: 有时功能仅部分兼容，在这种情况下，您可以单独列出不兼容的情况。要引用包中的另一个函数，请使用 <f>fn</f> 。例如：

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is useful to explicitly tell Octave to use the default value of an input argument. This can be done writing a ‘
trans-unit.target: 有时，明确告诉Octave使用输入参数的默认值很有用。这可以通过写一个“

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it is useful to see the commands in a function or script as they are being evaluated. This can be especially helpful for debugging some kinds of problems.
trans-unit.target: 有时,在函数或脚本中看到正在执行的命令是很有用的。这对调试某些问题特别有帮助。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes one does not have the function, but only the raw (x, y) points from which to perform an integration. This can occur when collecting data in an experiment. The trapz function can integrate these values as shown in the following example where "data" has been collected on the cosine function over the range [0, pi/2).
trans-unit.target: 有时，某人不具有该功能，而仅具有从其进行积分的原始（x，y）点。在实验中收集数据时可能会发生这种情况。所述 trapz 如图以下示例，其中“数据”已被收集在范围[0，π/ 2）的余弦函数功能可以集成这些值。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes one needs to write data to a file that is only temporary. This is most commonly used when an external program launched from within Octave needs to access data. When Octave exits all temporary files will be deleted, so this step need not be executed manually.
trans-unit.target: 有时,人们需要将数据写入一个临时文件。最常见的情况是,从Octave内部启动的外部程序需要访问数据。当Octave退出时,所有的临时文件都会被删除,所以这一步不需要手动执行。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes people give a few sketchy facts and ask, “Does this ring a bell?” This cannot help us fix a bug. It is better to send a complete bug report to begin with.
trans-unit.target: 有时人们会给出一些粗略的事实，然后问：“这响了吗？” 这无法帮助我们修复错误。最好先发送完整的错误报告。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the number of input arguments is not known when the function is defined. As an example think of a function that returns the smallest of all its input arguments. For example:
trans-unit.target: 有时,在定义函数时,输入参数的数量是不知道的。举个例子,想一想一个函数,它返回的是所有输入参数中最小的一个。例如

trans-unit.source: Sometimes the number of items can not be computed in advance, and stack-like operations are needed. When elements are being repeatedly inserted or removed from the end of an array, Octave detects it as stack usage and attempts to use a smarter memory management strategy by pre-allocating the array in bigger chunks. This strategy is also applied to cell and struct arrays.
trans-unit.target: 有时无法预先计算出项目的数量,需要进行类似堆栈的操作。当一个数组的末尾反复插入或删除元素时,Octave会将其检测为堆栈使用,并尝试使用更智能的内存管理策略,以更大的块数预分配数组。这种策略也适用于单元格和结构数组。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes to help describe one expression, another expression is shown that produces identical results. The exact equivalence of expressions is indicated with ‘
trans-unit.target: 有时为了帮助描述一个表达式，有时会显示另一种产生相同结果的表达式。表达式的精确等价用'

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you want to write a function so that when you call it, it modifies variables in your own context. This allows you to use a pass-by-name style of function, which is similar to using a pointer in programming languages such as C.
trans-unit.target: 有时你想写一个函数,这样当你调用它时,它就会修改你自己上下文中的变量。这就允许你使用逐名传递风格的函数,这类似于在C语言等编程语言中使用指针。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, you may find it necessary to evaluate an expression that has been computed and stored in a string, which is exactly what the eval function lets you do.
trans-unit.target: 有时，您可能发现有必要评估已经计算并存储在字符串中的表达式，这正是 eval 函数可以执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: Sort the numbers <var>z</var> into complex conjugate pairs ordered by increasing real part.
trans-unit.target: 将数字 <var>z</var> 排序为复数共轭对，并按增加的实部进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sort the rows of the matrix <var>A</var> according to the order of the columns specified in <var>c</var>.
trans-unit.target: 根据 <var>c</var> 中指定的列顺序对矩阵 <var>A</var> 的行进行排序。

trans-unit.source: Sorting of complex entries is done first by magnitude (abs (z)) and for any ties by phase angle (angle (z)). For example:
trans-unit.target: 复杂条目的排序首先按幅度（ abs (z) ）进行，对于任何联系按相角（ angle (z) ）进行排序。例如：

trans-unit.target: 源代码荧光笔和操纵器；Scintilla的Qt端口（http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/software/qscintilla）。QScintilla用于GUI中的语法突出显示和代码完成。

trans-unit.source: Spaces are ignored during conversion and may be used to make the binary number more readable.
trans-unit.target: 在转换过程中,空格被忽略,可以用来使二进制数更易读。

trans-unit.target: 专门的解决方案

trans-unit.source: Specifies points to be used in defining subintervals of the quadrature algorithm, or if a, b, or waypoints are complex then the quadrature is calculated as a contour integral along a piecewise continuous path. For more detail see quadgk.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于定义正交算法子间隔的点，或者如果 a ， b 或 waypoints 很复杂，则将正交计算为沿着分段连续路径的轮廓积分。有关更多详细信息，请参见 quadgk 。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no run-time measurement of the optimal means of calculating a particular is performed, and a simple heuristic is used to pick a (probably sub-optimal) plan. The advantage of this method is that there is little or no overhead in the generation of the plan, which is appropriate for a Fourier transform that will be calculated once.
trans-unit.target: 指定不进行运行时的最佳计算方式的测量,而用一个简单的启发式方法来选择一个(可能是次优的)计划。这种方法的优点是在生成计划时开销很小或没有开销,这对于将计算一次的傅里叶变换来说是合适的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the result should always include a decimal point, even if no digits follow it. For the ‘
trans-unit.target: 指定结果中应始终包含小数点，即使后面没有数字也是如此。为了 '

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size of the text fields and can take three forms:
trans-unit.target: 指定文本字段的大小,可以有三种形式。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the opengl (pixel-based) or painters (vector-based) renderer is used. This is equivalent to changing the figure’s "Renderer" property. When the figure RendererMode property is "auto" Octave will use the "opengl" renderer for raster formats (e.g., JPEG) and "painters" for vector formats (e.g., PDF). Those options are only supported for the "qt" graphics tookit.
trans-unit.target: 指定是使用opengl（基于像素）渲染器，还是使用painters（基于矢量）渲染器。这等效于更改图形的 "Renderer" 属性。当图形 RendererMode 属性为 "auto" Octave将对栅格格式（例如JPEG）使用 "opengl" 渲染器，对于矢量格式（例如PDF）使用 "painters" 。这些选项仅受“ qt”图形接受器支持。

trans-unit.source: Specify elements of the state vector that are expected to remain non-negative during the simulation.
trans-unit.target: 指定状态向量中预计在模拟过程中保持非负值的元素。

trans-unit.source: Specify parts of the input which are considered comments and will be skipped. <var>value</var> is the comment style and can be either (1) A string or 1x1 cell string, to skip everything to the right of it; (2) A cell array of two strings, to skip everything between the first and second strings. Comments are only parsed where whitespace is accepted and do not act as delimiters.
trans-unit.target: 指定输入中被视为注释且将被跳过的部分。 <var>value</var> 是注释样式，可以是（1）字符串或1x1单元格字符串，以跳过其右边的所有内容；（2）两个字符串的单元格数组，以跳过第一和第二字符串之间的所有内容。仅在接受空格且不充当分隔符的情况下解析注释。

trans-unit.source: Specify the color as a string
trans-unit.target: 将颜色指定为字符串

trans-unit.source: Specify the color numerically
trans-unit.target: 以数字方式指定颜色

trans-unit.source: Specify the command for calling Ghostscript. For Unix the default is "gs" and for Windows it is "gswin32c".
trans-unit.target: 指定用于调用Ghostscript的命令。对于Unix，默认值为 "gs" ；对于Windows，默认值为 "gswin32c" 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the font to use
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的字体

trans-unit.source: Specify the handle, <var>h</var>, of the figure to be printed.
trans-unit.target: 指定要打印图形的手柄 <var>h</var> 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the doc cache file to use. The value of filename specified on the command line will override any value of OCTAVE_DOC_CACHE_FILE found in the environment, but not any commands in the system or user startup files that use the doc_cache_file function.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的文档缓存文件的名称。在命令行上指定的 filename 的值将覆盖在环境中找到的 OCTAVE_DOC_CACHE_FILE 的任何值，但不会覆盖使用 doc_cache_file 函数的系统或用户启动文件中的任何命令。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the file containing Texinfo macros for use by makeinfo.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含 Texinfo 宏的文件名,供 makeinfo 使用。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the file containing documentation strings for the built-in functions of Octave. This value is normally correct and should only need to specified in extraordinary situations.
trans-unit.target: 指定包含Octave内置功能的文档字符串的文件名。这个值通常是正确的,只有在特殊情况下才需要指定。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the info file to use. The value of filename specified on the command line will override any value of OCTAVE_INFO_FILE found in the environment, but not any commands in the system or user startup files that use the info_file function.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的信息文件的名称。在命令行上指定的 filename 值将覆盖在环境中找到的任何 OCTAVE_INFO_FILE 值，但不会覆盖使用 info_file 函数的系统或用户启动文件中的任何命令。

trans-unit.source: Specify the name of the info program to use. The value of program specified on the command line will override any value of OCTAVE_INFO_PROGRAM found in the environment, but not any commands in the system or user startup files that use the info_program function.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的信息程序的名称。在命令行上指定的 program 的值将覆盖在环境中找到的任何 OCTAVE_INFO_PROGRAM 的值，但不会覆盖使用 info_program 函数的系统或用户启动文件中的任何命令。

trans-unit.source: Specify the orientation of the plot for printed output. For non-printed output the aspect ratio of the output corresponds to the plot area defined by the "paperposition" property in the orientation specified. This option is equivalent to changing the figure’s "paperorientation" property.
trans-unit.target: 指定打印输出图的方向。对于非打印输出，输出的纵横比对应于在指定方向上由 "paperposition" 属性定义的打印区域。此选项等效于更改图形的 "paperorientation" 属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the path to search for programs to run. The value of path specified on the command line will override any value of OCTAVE_EXEC_PATH found in the environment, but not any commands in the system or user startup files that set the built-in variable EXEC_PATH.
trans-unit.target: 指定搜索要运行的程序的路径。在命令行上指定的 path 的值将覆盖在环境中找到的任何 OCTAVE_EXEC_PATH 的值，但不会设置系统或用户启动文件中设置内置变量 EXEC_PATH 的任何命令。

trans-unit.source: Specify the position and size of the figure canvas. The four elements of the vector are the coordinates of the lower left corner and width and height of the figure. See units property.
trans-unit.target: 指定图形画布的位置和大小。向量的四个元素是左下角的坐标以及图形的宽度和高度。请参阅单位属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the position and size of the figure including the top menubar and the bottom status bar. The four elements of the vector are the coordinates of the lower left corner and width and height of the figure. See units property.
trans-unit.target: 指定图形的位置和大小，包括顶部菜单栏和底部状态栏。向量的四个元素是左下角的坐标以及图形的宽度和高度。请参阅单位属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the position of the plot excluding titles, axes, and legend. The four elements of the vector are the coordinates of the lower left corner and width and height of the plot, in units normalized to the width and height of the plot window. For example, [0.2, 0.3, 0.4, 0.5] sets the lower left corner of the axes at (0.2, 0.3) and the width and height to be 0.4 and 0.5 respectively. See outerposition property.
trans-unit.target: 指定图的位置（标题，轴和图例除外）。向量的四个元素是左下角的坐标以及图的宽度和高度，以标准化为图窗口的宽度和高度的单位为单位。例如， [0.2, 0.3, 0.4, 0.5] 将轴的左下角分别设置为（0.2，0.3），宽度和高度分别为0.4和0.5。请参阅outerposition属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the position of the plot including titles, axes, and legend. The four elements of the vector are the coordinates of the lower left corner and width and height of the plot, in units normalized to the width and height of the plot window. For example, [0.2, 0.3, 0.4, 0.5] sets the lower left corner of the axes at (0.2, 0.3) and the width and height to be 0.4 and 0.5 respectively. See position property.
trans-unit.target: 指定图的位置，包括标题，轴和图例。向量的四个元素是左下角的坐标以及图的宽度和高度，以标准化为图窗口的宽度和高度的单位为单位。例如， [0.2, 0.3, 0.4, 0.5] 将轴的左下角（0.2，0.3）和宽度和高度分别设置为0.4和0.5。参见position属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify the relative height and width of the data displayed in the axes. Setting dataaspectratio to [1, 2] causes the length of one unit as displayed on the x-axis to be the same as the length of 2 units on the y-axis. See daspect function. Setting dataaspectratio also forces the dataaspectratiomode property to be set to "manual".
trans-unit.target: 指定轴中显示的数据的相对高度和宽度。将 dataaspectratio 设置为 [1, 2] 会使x轴上显示的一个单位的长度与y轴上的2个单位的长度相同。请参阅daspect函数。设置 dataaspectratio 还将强制将 dataaspectratiomode 属性设置为 "manual" 。

trans-unit.source: Specify the size of the font to use
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的字体大小

trans-unit.source: Specify the string used as a title for the current axis.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于当前轴的标题的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specify the string used to label the x-axis of the current axis.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于标记当前轴的X轴的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Specify the two-dimensional integration method to be used, with valid options being "auto" (default), "tiled", or "iterated". When using "auto", Octave will choose the "tiled" method unless any of the integration limits are infinite.
trans-unit.target: 指定要使用的二维积分方法，有效选项为 "auto" （默认）， "tiled" 或 "iterated" 。当使用 "auto" ，除非任何积分限制是无限的，Octave都会选择 "tiled" 方法。

trans-unit.source: Specify whether odefun can be passed multiple values of the state at once.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否可以一次向 odefun 传递状态的多个值。

trans-unit.source: Specify whether axes processes mouse events or passes them to ancestors of the object. When enabled, the object may respond to mouse clicks by evaluating the "buttondownfcn", showing the uicontextmenu, and eventually becoming the root "currentobject". This property is only relevant when the object can accept mouse clicks which is determined by the "pickableparts" property. See pickableparts property.
trans-unit.target: 指定轴是处理鼠标事件还是将鼠标事件传递给对象的祖先。启用后，对象可以通过评估 "buttondownfcn" ，显示uicontextmenu并最终成为根 "currentobject" currentobject”来响应鼠标单击。仅当对象可以接受由 "pickableparts" 属性确定的鼠标单击时，此属性才相关。请参见pickableparts属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify whether axes will accept mouse clicks. By default, pickableparts is "visible" and only visible parts of the axes or its children may react to mouse clicks. When pickableparts is "all" both visible and invisible parts (or children) may react to mouse clicks. When pickableparts is "none" mouse clicks on the object are ignored and transmitted to any objects underneath this one. When an object is configured to accept mouse clicks the "hittest" property will determine how they are processed. See hittest property.
trans-unit.target: 指定轴是否接受鼠标单击。默认情况下， pickableparts 是 "visible" 并且只有轴或其子级的可见部分可以对鼠标单击做出反应。当 pickableparts 为 "all" ，可见部分和不可见部分（或子级）都可能对鼠标单击做出反应。当 pickableparts 为 "none" ，在对象上的鼠标单击将被忽略，并传输到该对象下面的任何对象。将对象配置为接受鼠标单击时， "hittest" 属性将确定如何处理它们。请参阅hittest属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify whether this object’s callback functions may be interrupted by other callbacks. By default interruptible is "on" and callbacks that make use of drawnow, figure, waitfor, getframe or pause functions are eventually interrupted. See Callbacks section.

trans-unit.source: Specify whether uipushtool will accept mouse clicks. By default, pickableparts is "visible" and only visible parts of the uipushtool or its children may react to mouse clicks. When pickableparts is "all" both visible and invisible parts (or children) may react to mouse clicks. When pickableparts is "none" mouse clicks on the object are ignored and transmitted to any objects underneath this one. When an object is configured to accept mouse clicks the "hittest" property will determine how they are processed. See hittest property.
trans-unit.target: 指定uipushtool是否接受鼠标单击。默认情况下， pickableparts 是 "visible" ，只有uipushtool或其子级的可见部分可以对鼠标单击做出反应。当 pickableparts 为 "all" ，可见部分和不可见部分（或子级）都可能对鼠标单击做出反应。当 pickableparts 为 "none" ，在对象上的鼠标单击将被忽略，并传输到该对象下面的任何对象。将对象配置为接受鼠标单击时， "hittest" 属性将确定如何处理它们。请参阅hittest属性。

trans-unit.source: Swing factor in the Newton iteration convergence test. The test is applied to the residual vector, premultiplied by the approximate Jacobian. For convergence, the weighted RMS norm of this vector (scaled by the error weights) must be less than EPINIT*EPCON, where EPCON = 0.33 is the analogous test constant used in the time steps. The default is EPINIT = 0.01.
trans-unit.target: 牛顿迭代收敛测试中的摆动因子。将测试应用于残差矢量，再乘以近似雅可比矩阵。为了收敛，此向量的加权RMS范数（由误差权重定标）必须小于 EPINIT*EPCON ，其中 EPCON = 0.33是时间步中使用的类似测试常数。默认值为 EPINIT = 0.01。

trans-unit.source: That is, the persistent variable is only removed from memory when the function containing the variable is removed. Note that if the function definition is typed directly into the Octave prompt, the persistent variable will be cleared by a simple clear command as the entire function definition will be removed from memory. If you do not want a persistent variable to be removed from memory even if the function is cleared, you should use the mlock function (see Function Locking).
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，仅当包含变量的函数被删除时，才从内存中删除持久变量。请注意，如果直接在Octave提示符下键入函数定义，则将通过简单的 clear 命令清除持久变量，因为将从内存中删除整个函数定义。如果即使清除了该函数，也不想从内存中删除持久性变量，则应使用 mlock 函数（请参见Function Locking）。

trans-unit.source: That is, the smaller array of size [1 3] gets copied along the singleton dimension (the number of rows) until it is [3 3]. No actual copying takes place, however. The internal implementation reuses elements along the necessary dimension in order to achieve the desired effect without copying in memory.
trans-unit.target: 也就是说，沿着单例维度（行数）复制大小为 [1 3] 的较小数组，直到它为 [3 3] 为止。但是，没有实际的复制发生。内部实现沿必需的维度重复使用元素，以实现所需的效果而无需复制到内存中。

trans-unit.source: The "UniformValues" option specifies whether the values of the map must be strictly of the same type. If is_uniform is true, any values which would be added to the map are first validated to ensure they are of the correct type.
trans-unit.target: 该 "UniformValues" 选项指定地图的值必须严格相同类型的。如果 is_uniform 为true，则首先验证将添加到映射的任何值，以确保它们的类型正确。

trans-unit.source: The "emptyvalue" option may be used to specify the value used to fill empty fields. The default is zero. Note that any non-numeric values, such as text, are also replaced by the "emptyvalue".
trans-unit.target: 该 "emptyvalue" 选项可用于指定用于填充空字段的值。默认值为零。请注意，任何非数字值（例如文本）也将替换为 "emptyvalue" 。

trans-unit.source: The "landscape" option changes the orientation so the plot width is larger than the plot height. The "paperposition" is also modified so that the plot fills the page, while leaving a 0.25 inch border.
trans-unit.target: 在 "landscape" 选项改变方向，使情节宽度比积高度。该 "paperposition" 也被修改，使得剧情充满页面，同时留下一个0.25英寸的边界。

trans-unit.source: The "portrait" option (default) changes the orientation so the plot height is larger than the plot width. It also restores the default "paperposition" property.
trans-unit.target: 在 "portrait" 这样的情节高度比积宽度选项（默认）改变方向。它还将恢复默认的 "paperposition" 属性。

trans-unit.source: The "position" property can be used to exactly position the subplot axes within the current figure. The option pos is a 4-element vector [x, y, width, height] that determines the location and size of the axes. The values in pos are normalized in the range [0,1].
trans-unit.target: 的 "position" 属性可以用于目前的数字内准确定位的副区轴。 pos 选项是一个4元素向量[x，y，宽度，高度]，它确定轴的位置和大小。 pos 中的值在[0,1]范围内进行归一化。

trans-unit.source: The "tall" option sets the orientation to "portrait" and fills the page with the plot, while leaving a 0.25 inch border.
trans-unit.target: 在 "tall" 选项设置的方位 "portrait" ，并随着剧情填充页面，同时留下一个0.25英寸的边界。

trans-unit.source: The "tex" option implements a subset of TeX functionality when rendering text. This allows the insertion of special glyphs such as Greek characters or mathematical symbols. Special characters are inserted by using a backslash (\) character followed by a code, as shown in Table 15.1.
trans-unit.target: 呈现文本时， "tex" 选项实现TeX功能的子集。这样可以插入特殊的字形，例如希腊字符或数学符号。如表15.1所示，使用反斜杠（\）字符和代码插入特殊字符。

trans-unit.source: The () operator or elem method allow the values of the matrix or array to be read or set. These methods take a single argument, which is of type octave_idx_type, that is the index into the matrix or array. Additionally, the matrix type allows two argument versions of the () operator and elem method, giving the row and column index of the value to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 在 () 算子或 elem 方法允许矩阵或数组的值被读取或集。这些方法采用一个参数，该参数的类型为 octave_idx_type ，它是矩阵或数组的索引。此外，矩阵类型允许使用 () 运算符和 elem 方法的两个参数版本，从而给出要获取或设置的值的行索引和列索引。

trans-unit.source: The diary is disabled during the execution of this function. When system is used, any output produced by external programs is not captured, unless their output is captured by the system function itself.
trans-unit.target: 该 diary 本功能的执行过程中被禁用。使用 system ，不会捕获外部程序产生的任何输出，除非它们的输出由 system 功能本身捕获。

trans-unit.source: The do-until statement is similar to the while statement, except that it repeatedly executes a statement until a condition becomes true, and the test of the condition is at the end of the loop, so the body of the loop is always executed at least once. As with the condition in an if statement, the condition in a do-until statement is considered true if its value is nonzero, and false if its value is zero. If the value of the conditional expression in a do-until statement is a vector or a matrix, it is considered true only if it is non-empty and all of the elements are nonzero.
trans-unit.target: 该 do-until 语句是类似于 while 声明，但它反复，直到条件为真执行语句和条件的测试是在循环的末尾，这样的循环体至少始终执行一旦。与 if 语句中的条件一样，如果 do-until 语句中的条件的值非零，则将其视为true；如果其值为零，则将其视为false。如果 do-until 语句中条件表达式的值是向量或矩阵，则仅当条件表达式为非空且所有元素均为非零时才被视为true 。

trans-unit.source: The dsearch and dsearchn find the closest point in a tessellation to the desired point. The desired point does not necessarily have to be in the tessellation, and even if it the returned point of the tessellation does not have to be one of the vertexes of the N-simplex within which the desired point is found.
trans-unit.target: 该 dsearch 和 dsearchn 找到镶嵌所需的点的最近点。所需点不一定必须位于曲面细分中，即使曲面细分的返回点也不必是可以在其中找到所需点的N单形的顶点之一。

trans-unit.source: The linspace function returns a row vector when both start and end are scalars. If one, or both, inputs are vectors, then linspace transforms them to column vectors and returns a matrix where each row is an independent sequence between start(row_n), end(row_n).
trans-unit.target: 当 start 和 end 均为标量时， linspace 函数将返回行向量。如果一个或两个输入均为向量，则 linspace 将其转换为列向量，并返回一个矩阵，其中每一行是 start(row_n), end(row_n) （ row_n ）和  end （ row_n ）之间的独立序列。

trans-unit.source: The load command can read data stored in Octave’s text and binary formats, and MATLAB’s binary format. If compiled with zlib support, it can also load gzip-compressed files. It will automatically detect the type of file and do conversion from different floating point formats (currently only IEEE big and little endian, though other formats may be added in the future).
trans-unit.target: 该 load 命令可以读取存储在八度的文本和二进制格式，以及数据MATLAB的二进制格式。如果使用zlib支持进行编译，它还可以加载gzip压缩的文件。它会自动检测文件的类型，并从不同的浮点格式（目前只有IEEE大尾数法，尽管将来可能会添加其他格式）进行转换。

trans-unit.source: The meshc function is similar to mesh, but also produces a plot of contours for the surface.
trans-unit.target: 该 meshc 功能类似于 mesh ，而且产生轮廓线的表面的曲线图。

trans-unit.source: The mkoctfile function compiles source code written in C, C++, or Fortran. Depending on the options used with mkoctfile, the compiled code can be called within Octave or can be used as a stand-alone application.
trans-unit.target: 所述 mkoctfile 用C，C ++，或Fortran函数编译的源代码。根据与 mkoctfile 一起使用的选项，可以在Octave中调用已编译的代码，也可以将其用作独立的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The mxArray structure contains at a minimum, the name of the variable it represents, its dimensions, its type, and whether the variable is real or complex. It can also contain a number of additional fields depending on the type of the mxArray. There are a number of functions to create mxArray structures, including mxCreateDoubleMatrix, mxCreateCellArray, mxCreateSparse, and the generic mxCreateNumericArray.
trans-unit.target: 该 mxArray 结构包含在一个最小值，它代表的变量，它的尺寸，它的类型的名称，以及是否该变量是实数或复数。根据 mxArray 的类型，它也可以包含许多其他字段。有许多的函数来创建 mxArray 结构，包括 mxCreateDoubleMatrix ， mxCreateCellArray ， mxCreateSparse ，和通用 mxCreateNumericArray 。

trans-unit.source: The num2str function is not very flexible. For better control over the results, use sprintf (see Formatted Output).
trans-unit.target: 该 num2str 功能不是很灵活。为了更好地控制结果，请使用 sprintf （请参见Formatted Output）。

trans-unit.source: The onCleanup command associates an ordinary Octave variable (the trigger) with an arbitrary function (the action). Whenever the Octave variable ceases to exist—whether due to a function return, an error, or simply because the variable has been removed with clear—then the assigned function is executed.
trans-unit.target: 所述 onCleanup 命令相关联的普通倍频程变量（触发）与任意的功能（作用）。每当Octave变量停止存在时（无论是由于函数返回，错误还是仅由于 clear 变量已将其清除），都将执行分配的函数。

trans-unit.source: The path function changes the search path that Octave uses to find functions. It is possible to set the path to a value which excludes Octave’s own built-in functions. If the Octave:remove-init-dir warning is enabled then Octave will warn when the path function has been used in a way that may render Octave unworkable. By default, the Octave:remove-init-dir warning is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 该 path 功能改变了八度用于查找功能的搜索路径。可以将路径设置为不包含Octave自身内置函数的值。如果启用了 Octave:remove-init-dir 警告，则当使用 path 功能时可能会导致Octave无法使用，则Octave将发出警告。默认情况下，启用 Octave:remove-init-dir 警告。

trans-unit.source: The warning function also allows you to control which warnings are actually printed to the screen. If the warning function is called with a string argument that is either "on" or "off" all warnings will be enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 该 warning 功能，您还可以到警告实际打印到屏幕控制。如果使用字符串参数 "on" 或 "off" 调用 warning 功能，则将启用或禁用所有警告。

trans-unit.source: The while statement is the simplest looping statement in Octave. It repeatedly executes a statement as long as a condition is true. As with the condition in an if statement, the condition in a while statement is considered true if its value is nonzero, and false if its value is zero. If the value of the conditional expression in a while statement is a vector or a matrix, it is considered true only if it is non-empty and all of the elements are nonzero.
trans-unit.target: 的 while 语句是八度的最简单的循环语句。只要条件为真，它就会重复执行一条语句。与 if 语句中的条件一样， while 语句中的条件如果其值为非零，则视为true；如果其值为零，则视为false。如果 while 语句中条件表达式的值是向量或矩阵，则仅当条件表达式为非空且所有元素均为非零时才被视为true 。

trans-unit.source: The width parameter is a positive integer specifying the minimum number of columns used for printing. No maximum is needed as the field will auto-expand as required.
trans-unit.target: 的 width 参数是一个正整数，指定用于打印的列的最小数目。不需要最大值，因为该字段将根据需要自动扩展。

trans-unit.source: The xlim, ylim, and zlim functions may be used to get or set individual axis limits. Each has the same form.

trans-unit.source: The xticks, yticks, zticks, rticks, and thetaticks functions may be used to get or set the tick mark locations and modes on the respective axis. Each has the same form, although mode options are not currently available for rticks, and thetaticks.

trans-unit.source: The fmt argument may also be used to assign legend labels. To do so, include the desired label between semicolons after the formatting sequence described above, e.g., "+b;Key Title;". Note that the last semicolon is required and Octave will generate an error if it is left out.
trans-unit.target: 该 fmt 参数也可以用来分配图例标签。为此，请在上述格式化序列后的分号之间包含所需标签，例如 "+b;Key Title;" 。请注意，最后一个分号是必需的，如果省略掉八度会产生错误。

trans-unit.source: The <var>fmt</var> argument specifies the linestyle to be used by the plot command.
trans-unit.target: 该 <var>fmt</var> 参数指定到由绘图命令中使用的线型。

trans-unit.source: The fmt format argument can also be used to control the plot style. It is a string composed of four optional parts: "<linestyle><marker><color><;displayname;>". When a marker is specified, but no linestyle, only the markers are plotted. Similarly, if a linestyle is specified, but no marker, then only lines are drawn. If both are specified then lines and markers will be plotted. If no fmt and no property/value pairs are given, then the default plot style is solid lines with no markers and the color determined by the "colororder" property of the current axes.
trans-unit.target: 该 fmt 格式参数也可以用来控制打印样式。它是由四个可选部分组成的字符串：“ <linestyle> <marker> <color> <; displayname;>”。如果指定了标记但未指定线型，​​则仅绘制标记。同样，如果指定了线型，但未指定标记，则仅绘制线。如果两者都指定，则将绘制线条和标记。如果没有给出 fmt 且没有提供 property / value 对，则默认 "colororder" 样式为实线，不带标记，并且颜色由当前轴的“ colororder”属性确定。

trans-unit.source: The <var>n</var> are log-spaced from 1 to <var>max_n</var>. For each <var>n</var>, an initialization expression (<var>init</var>) is computed to create any data needed for the test. If a second expression (<var>f2</var>) is given then the execution times of the two expressions are compared. When called without output arguments the results are printed to stdout and displayed graphically.
trans-unit.target: 所述 <var>n</var> 从1数间隔以 <var>max_n</var> 。对于每个 <var>n</var> ，都会计算一个初始化表达式（ <var>init</var> ）以创建测试所需的任何数据。如果给出第二个表达式（ <var>f2</var> ），则比较两个表达式的执行时间。当不带输出参数调用时，结果将打印到标准输出并以图形方式显示。

trans-unit.source: The Delaunay triangulation is a tessellation of the convex hull of a set of points such that no N-sphere defined by the N-triangles contains any other points from the set.
trans-unit.target: Delaunay三角法是对一组点的凸壳进行切分,使N三角所定义的N个球体都不包含该集合中的任何其他点。

trans-unit.source: The Delaunay triangulation is constructed from a set of circum-circles. These circum-circles are chosen so that there are at least three of the points in the set to triangulation on the circumference of the circum-circle. None of the points in the set of points falls within any of the circum-circles.
trans-unit.target: Delaunay三角测量是由一组圆周构成的。这些圆周的选择是为了在圆周的圆周上至少有三个点要进行三角测量。点集中没有一个点落在任何一个圆周内。

trans-unit.source: The FFT is calculated along the first non-singleton dimension of the array. Thus if x is a matrix, fft (x) computes the FFT for each column of x.
trans-unit.target: 沿着数组的第一个非单维度计算FFT。因此，如果 x 是矩阵，则 fft (x) 为 x 的每一列计算FFT 。

trans-unit.source: The GUI elements available are I/O dialogs, a progress bar, and UI elements for plot windows. For example, rather than hardcoding a filename for output results a script can open a dialog box and allow the user to choose a file. Similarly, if a calculation is expected to take a long time a script can display a progress bar. The various UI elements can be used to fully customize the plot window with menubars, toolbars, context menus, pushbuttons, sliders, etc.
trans-unit.target: 可用的GUI元素有I/O对话框、进度条和绘图窗口的UI元素。例如,脚本可以打开一个对话框,让用户选择一个文件,而不是为输出结果硬编码一个文件名。同样的,如果一个计算需要很长的时间,脚本可以显示一个进度条。各种UI元素可以通过menubars、工具栏、上下文菜单、按钮、滑块等来完全自定义绘图窗口。

trans-unit.source: The Hessenberg decomposition is P * H * P' = A where P is a square unitary matrix (P' * P = I, using complex-conjugate transposition) and H is upper Hessenberg (H(i, j) = 0 forall i > j+1).
trans-unit.target: Hessenberg分解为 P * H * P' = A ，其中 P 为平方unit矩阵（ P' * P = I ，使用复共轭转置）， H 为上Hessenberg（ H(i, j) = 0 forall i > j+1) 。

trans-unit.source: The Hessenberg decomposition is usually used as the first step in an eigenvalue computation, but has other applications as well (see Golub, Nash, and Van Loan, IEEE Transactions on Automatic Control, 1979).
trans-unit.target: Hessenberg分解通常被用作特征值计算的第一步,但也有其他应用(见Golub、Nash和Van Loan,IEEE Transactions on Automatic Control,1979)。

trans-unit.source: The Hessenberg-triangular decomposition is the first step in Moler and Stewart’s QZ decomposition algorithm.
trans-unit.target: Hessenberg三角分解是Moler和Stewart的QZ分解算法的第一步。

trans-unit.source: The IEEE floating point standard defines the result of the expressions 0*Inf and 0*NaN as NaN. This is widely agreed to be a good compromise. Numerical software dealing with structured and sparse matrices (including Octave) however, almost always makes a distinction between a "numerical zero" and an "assumed zero". A "numerical zero" is a zero value occurring in a place where any floating-point value could occur. It is normally stored somewhere in memory as an explicit value. An "assumed zero", on the contrary, is a zero matrix element implied by the matrix structure (diagonal, triangular) or a sparsity pattern; its value is usually not stored explicitly anywhere, but is implied by the underlying data structure.
trans-unit.target: IEEE浮点标准将表达式 0*Inf 和 0*NaN 的结果定义为 NaN 。人们普遍认为这是一个很好的妥协。但是，处理结构化和稀疏矩阵（包括八度）的数值软件几乎总是区分“数字零”和“假定零”。 “数字零”是在任何浮点值可能出现的地方出现的零值。它通常作为显式值存储在内存中的某个位置。相反，“假定零”是由矩阵结构（对角，三角形）或稀疏模式所隐含的零矩阵元素；它的值通常不会显式存储在任何位置，但是由底层数据结构隐含。

trans-unit.source: The JIT compiler is a very new feature in Octave and not all valid Octave statements can currently be accelerated. However, if no other technique is available it may be worth benchmarking the code with JIT enabled. The function jit_enable is used to turn compilation on or off. The function jit_startcnt sets the threshold for acceleration. Loops with iteration counts above jit_startcnt will be accelerated. The functions jit_failcnt and debug_jit are not likely to be of use to anyone not working directly on the implementation of the JIT compiler.
trans-unit.target: JIT编译器是Octave中的一个非常新的功能，当前并不是所有有效的Octave语句都可以加速。但是，如果没有其他可用的技术，则值得在启用JIT的情况下对代码进行基准测试。函数 jit_enable 用于打开或关闭编译。函数 jit_startcnt 设置加速阈值。迭代计数高于 jit_startcnt 的循环将被加速。函数 jit_failcnt 和 debug_jit 不太可能对不直接从事JIT编译器实现的任何人使用。

trans-unit.source: The JVM allocates a fixed amount of initial memory and may expand this pool up to a fixed maximum memory limit. The default values depend on the Java version (see javamem). The memory pool is shared by all Java objects running in the JVM. This strict memory limit is intended mainly to avoid runaway applications inside web browsers or in enterprise servers which can consume all memory and crash the system. When the maximum memory limit is hit, Java code will throw exceptions so that applications will fail or behave unexpectedly.
trans-unit.target: JVM分配固定数量的初始内存，并且可以将此池扩展到固定的最大内存限制。默认值取决于Java版本（请参阅javamem）。内存池由JVM中运行的所有Java对象共享。此严格的内存限制主要是为了避免Web浏览器或企业服务器中的应用程序失控，这些应用程序可能会消耗所有内存并使系统崩溃。当达到最大内存限制时，Java代码将引发异常，因此应用程序将失败或表现异常。

trans-unit.source: The JVM is only loaded once per Octave session. Thus, to change the used version of the JVM, you might have to re-start Octave. To check which version of the JVM is currently being used, run version -java.
trans-unit.target: 每个Octave会话仅加载一次JVM。因此，要更改JVM的使用版本，您可能必须重新启动Octave。要检查当前正在使用哪个版本的JVM，请运行 version -java 。

trans-unit.source: The Octave format for sparse matrices is identical to the mex format in that it is a compressed column sparse format. Also, in both implementations sparse matrices are required to be two-dimensional. The only difference of importance to the programmer is that the real and imaginary parts of the matrix are stored separately.
trans-unit.target: 稀疏矩阵的Octave格式与mex格式相同,它是一种压缩的列稀疏格式。另外,在这两种实现中,稀疏矩阵都被要求是二维的。对程序员来说,唯一重要的区别是矩阵的实部和虚部是分开存储的。

trans-unit.source: The Octave sources are primarily written in C++, but some portions are also written in C and Fortran. The Octave sources are intended to be portable. Recent versions of the GNU compiler collection (GCC) should work (https://gcc.gnu.org). If you use GCC, you should avoid mixing versions. For example, be sure that you are not using the obsolete g77 Fortran compiler with modern versions of gcc and g++.
trans-unit.target: Octave源代码主要是用C ++编写的，但是某些部分也用C和Fortran编写。八度音源旨在便携式。GNU编译器集合（GCC）的最新版本应该可以工作（https://gcc.gnu.org）。如果使用GCC，则应避免混合使用版本。例如，请确保您没有将过时的 g77 Fortran编译器与现代版本的 gcc 和 g++ 。

trans-unit.target: 基于OpenGL的图形工具包对文本的支持有限。这些限制包括仅使用ASCII字符(例如,不使用希腊字母)以及仅支持三种基本PostScript字体:Helvetica(默认)、Times或Courier。任何其他字体将被Helvetica取代。

trans-unit.source: The QR solver factorizes the problem with a Dulmage-Mendelsohn decomposition, to separate the problem into blocks that can be treated as over-determined, multiple well determined blocks, and a final over-determined block. For matrices with blocks of strongly connected nodes this is a big win as LU decomposition can be used for many blocks. It also significantly improves the chance of finding a solution to over-determined problems rather than just returning a vector of NaN’s.
trans-unit.target: QR解算器通过Dulmage-Mendelsohn分解将问题分解，以将问题分为多个块，这些块可以视为超确定块，多个确定良好的块以及最终超确定的块。对于具有强连接节点块的矩阵，这是一个很大的胜利，因为LU分解可用于许多块。这也大大提高了寻找解决方案的可能性，而不仅仅是返回NaN向量。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm used by quadgk involves subdividing the integration interval and evaluating each subinterval. If trace is true then after computing each of these partial integrals display: (1) the number of subintervals at this step, (2) the current estimate of the error err, (3) the current estimate for the integral q.
trans-unit.target: quadgk 使用的算法涉及细分积分间隔并评估每个子间隔。如果 trace 为true，则在计算这些部分积分中的每一个之后将显示：（1）此步骤的子间隔数，（2）误差 err 的当前估计，（3）积分 q 的当前估计。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm used by quadl involves recursively subdividing the integration interval. If trace is defined then for each subinterval display: (1) the total number of function evaluations, (2) the left end of the subinterval, (3) the length of the subinterval, (4) the approximation of the integral over the subinterval.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的算法 quadl 涉及递归细分积分区间。如果定义了 trace 线，则对于每个子间隔显示：（1）函数求值总数，（2）子间隔的左端，（3）子间隔的长度，（4）积分在子间隔上的近似值。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm used by quadv involves recursively subdividing the integration interval and applying Simpson’s rule on each subinterval. If trace is true then after computing each of these partial integrals display: (1) the total number of function evaluations, (2) the left end of the subinterval, (3) the length of the subinterval, (4) the approximation of the integral over the subinterval.
trans-unit.target: quadv 使用的算法包括递归细分积分间隔，​​并在每个子间隔上应用Simpson规则。如果 trace 为true，则在计算这些部分积分中的每一个之后，将显示：（1）函数求值的总数，（2）子区间的左端，（3）子区间的长度，（4）在子间隔上积分。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm used in sort is optimized for the sorting of partially ordered lists.
trans-unit.target: sort 使用的算法针对部分排序列表的排序进行了优化。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm uses Clenshaw-Curtis quadrature rules of increasing degree in each interval and bisects the interval if either the function does not appear to be smooth or a rule of maximum degree has been reached. The error estimate is computed from the L2-norm of the difference between two successive interpolations of the integrand over the nodes of the respective quadrature rules.
trans-unit.target: 该算法在每个区间内使用程度递增的Clenshaw-Curtis正交规则,如果函数不平滑或达到最大程度规则,则将区间分割。误差估计由积分在各正交规则节点上连续两次插值之差的L2-正态计算。

trans-unit.source: The answer is reasonably close to the exact value of 1. Ordinary quadrature is sensitive to the characteristics of the integrand. Empirical integration depends not just on the integrand, but also on the particular points chosen to represent the function. Repeating the example above with the sine function over the range [0, pi/2) produces far inferior results.

trans-unit.source: The appropriate sparsity preserving permutation of the original matrix is given by symamd and the factorization using this reordering can be visualized using the command q = symamd (A); r = chol (A(q,q)); spy (r). This gives 399 nonzero terms which is a significant improvement.
trans-unit.target: symamd给出了原始矩阵的适当稀疏保留排列，并且可以使用命令 q = symamd (A); r = chol (A(q,q)); spy (r) 可视化使用此重新排序的因式分解。r =胆（A（q，q））; 间谍（R） 。这给出了399个非零项，这是一个重大改进。

trans-unit.source: The argument <var>arg</var> must be a cell array of character strings or a character array.

trans-unit.source: The argument <var>limits</var> should be a 2-, 4-, 6-, or 8-element vector. The first and second elements specify the lower and upper limits for the x-axis. The third and fourth specify the limits for the y-axis, the fifth and sixth specify the limits for the z-axis, and the seventh and eighth specify the limits for the color axis. The special values -Inf and Inf may be used to indicate that the limit should be automatically computed based on the data in the axes.
trans-unit.target: 参数 <var>limits</var> 应为2、4、6或8个元素的向量。第一个和第二个元素指定x轴的下限和上限。第三和第四指定y轴的极限，第五和第六指定z轴的极限，第七和第八指定色轴的极限。特殊值-Inf和Inf可用于指示应基于轴中的数据自动计算极限。

trans-unit.source: The argument <var>sigma</var> determines which eigenvalues are returned. <var>sigma</var> can be either a scalar or a string. When <var>sigma</var> is a scalar, the <var>k</var> eigenvalues closest to <var>sigma</var> are returned. If <var>sigma</var> is a string, it must have one of the following values.
trans-unit.target: 参数 <var>sigma</var> 确定返回哪些特征值。 <var>sigma</var> 可以是标量或字符串。当 <var>sigma</var> 为标量时，将返回最接近 <var>sigma</var> 的 <var>k</var> 个特征值。如果 <var>sigma</var> 是字符串，则它必须具有以下值之一。

trans-unit.source: The argument sigma specifies which singular values to find. When sigma is the string 'L', the default, the largest singular values of A are found. Otherwise, sigma must be a real scalar and the singular values closest to sigma are found. As a corollary, sigma = 0 finds the smallest singular values. Note that for relatively small values of sigma, there is a chance that the requested number of singular values will not be found. In that case sigma should be increased.
trans-unit.target: 参数 sigma 指定要查找的奇异值。当 sigma 是字符串 'L' 时，默认情况下，将找到 A 的最大奇异值。否则， sigma 必须是实标量，并且找到最接近 sigma 的奇异值。作为推论， sigma = 0 得出最小的奇异值。请注意，对于相对较小的 sigma 值，有可能找不到所请求数量的奇异值。在这种情况下，应增加 sigma 。

trans-unit.source: The argument <var>x</var> must be a square matrix.
trans-unit.target: 参数 <var>x</var> 必须是一个方矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The argument may be either "on" or "off". If it is omitted, the current box state is toggled.
trans-unit.target: 参数可以是 "on" 或 "off" 。如果省略，则切换当前盒状态。

trans-unit.source: The arguments to all of Octave’s bitwise operations can be scalar or arrays, except for bitcmp, whose k argument must a scalar. In the case where more than one argument is an array, then all arguments must have the same shape, and the bitwise operator is applied to each of the elements of the argument individually. If at least one argument is a scalar and one an array, then the scalar argument is duplicated. Therefore

trans-unit.source: The assignment expression in the for statement works a bit differently than Octave’s normal assignment statement. Instead of assigning the complete result of the expression, it assigns each column of the expression to var in turn. If expression is a range, a row vector, or a scalar, the value of var will be a scalar each time the loop body is executed. If var is a column vector or a matrix, var will be a column vector each time the loop body is executed.
trans-unit.target: for 语句中的赋值表达式的工作方式与Octave的常规赋值语句略有不同。它没有分配表达式的完整结果，而是依次将表达式的每一列分配给 var 。如果 expression 是范围，行向量或标量，则每次执行循环主体时， var 的值将是标量。如果 var 是列向量或矩阵，则每次执行循环主体时 var 将是列向量。

trans-unit.source: The basic command to build a mex-file is either mkoctfile --mex or mex. The first command can be used either from within Octave or from the command line. To avoid issues with MATLAB’s own mex command, the use of the command mex is limited to within Octave. Compiled mex-files have the extension
trans-unit.target: 生成mex文件的基本命令是 mkoctfile --mex 或 mex 。可以从Octave或命令行中使用第一个命令。为避免MATLAB自己的 mex 命令出现问题，命令 mex 的使用仅限于Octave。编译的mex文件具有扩展名

trans-unit.source: The basic function to access the data in an array is mxGetPr. Because the mex interface assumes that real and imaginary parts of a complex array are stored separately, there is an equivalent function mxGetPi that gets the imaginary part. Both of these functions are only for use with double precision matrices. The generic functions mxGetData and mxGetImagData perform the same operation for all matrix types. For example:
trans-unit.target: 访问数组中数据的基本功能是 mxGetPr 。因为mex接口假定复杂数组的实部和虚部分别存储，所以存在一个等效函数 mxGetPi 获取虚部。这两个函数仅适用于双精度矩阵。通用函数 mxGetData 和 mxGetImagData 对所有矩阵类型执行相同的操作。例如：

trans-unit.source: The basic function to create a structure in a mex-file is mxCreateStructMatrix which creates a structure array with a two dimensional matrix, or mxCreateStructArray.
trans-unit.target: 在mex文件中创建结构的基本功能是 mxCreateStructMatrix ，它可以创建带有二维矩阵的结构数组或 mxCreateStructArray 。

trans-unit.source: The basic logical operations are &, |, and !, which correspond to “Logical And”, “Logical Or”, and “Logical Negation”. These operations all follow the usual rules of logic.
trans-unit.target: 基本逻辑运算是 & ， | 。和 ! ，分别对应于“逻辑与”，“逻辑或”和“逻辑否定”。这些操作都遵循通常的逻辑规则。

trans-unit.source: The basic mex type of all variables is mxArray. Any object, such as a matrix, cell array, or structure, is stored in this basic type. mxArray serves essentially the same purpose as the octave_value class in oct-files in that it acts as a container for all the more specialized types.

trans-unit.source: The best quadrature algorithm to use depends on the integrand. If you have empirical data, rather than a function, the choice is trapz or cumtrapz. If you are uncertain about the characteristics of the integrand, quadcc will be the most robust as it can handle discontinuities, singularities, oscillatory functions, and infinite intervals. When the integrand is smooth quadgk may be the fastest of the algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 使用的最佳正交算法取决于被积数。如果您有经验数据而不是函数，则选择 trapz 或 cumtrapz 。如果您不确定被积物的特性， quadcc 将是最可靠的，因为它可以处理不连续性，奇异性，振荡函数和无限区间。当被积物光滑时， quadgk 可能是最快的算法。

trans-unit.source: The built-in variable max_recursion_depth specifies a limit to the recursion depth and prevents Octave from recursing infinitely. Similarly, the variable max_stack_depth specifies a limit to the depth of function calls, whether recursive or not. These limits help prevent stack overflow on the computer Octave is running on, so that instead of exiting with a signal, the interpreter will throw an error and return to the command prompt.
trans-unit.target: 内置变量 max_recursion_depth 指定递归深度的限制，并防止Octave无限递归。同样，变量 max_stack_depth 指定对函数调用深度的限制，无论是否递归。这些限制有助于防止运行Octave的计算机上的堆栈溢出，因此解释器不会发出信号，而是抛出错误并返回命令提示符。

trans-unit.source: The commands to be edited are first copied to a temporary file. When you exit the editor, Octave executes the commands that remain in the file. It is often more convenient to use edit_history to define functions rather than attempting to enter them directly on the command line. The block of commands is executed as soon as you exit the editor. To avoid executing any commands, simply delete all the lines from the buffer before leaving the editor.
trans-unit.target: 首先将要编辑的命令复制到一个临时文件中。退出编辑器时，Octave执行文件中剩余的命令。通常，使用 edit_history 定义函数比尝试直接在命令行上输入函数更方便。退出编辑器后，将立即执行命令块。为了避免执行任何命令，只需在退出编辑器之前从缓冲区中删除所有行。

trans-unit.source: The complexity of accumarray in general for the non-sparse case is generally O(M+N), where N is the number of subscripts and M is the maximum subscript (linearized in multi-dimensional case). If func is one of @sum (default), @max, @min or @(x) {x}, an optimized code path is used. Note that for general reduction function the interpreter overhead can play a major part and it may be more efficient to do multiple accumarray calls and compute the results in a vectorized manner.
trans-unit.target: 对于非稀疏情况，accumarray的复杂度通常为O（M + N），其中N是下标的数量，M是最大下标（在多维情况下是线性化的）。如果 func 是 @sum （默认值）， @(x) {x} @max ，@ @min 或@（x）{x}之一，则使用优化的代码路径。请注意，对于一般归约函数，解释器开销可能起主要作用，并且进行多个accumarray调用并以矢量化方式计算结果可能会更有效。

The conceptually equivalent code when condition is a matrix is shown below.

trans-unit.source: The condition number of a matrix quantifies the sensitivity of the matrix inversion operation when small changes are made to matrix elements. Ideally the condition number will be close to 1. When the number is large this indicates small changes (such as underflow or round-off error) will produce large changes in the resulting output. In such cases the solution results from numerical computing are not likely to be accurate.
trans-unit.target: 矩阵的条件数量化了当矩阵元素发生微小变化时矩阵反演操作的灵敏度。理想情况下,条件数将接近于1。当该数字较大时,这表明小的变化(如下溢或舍入误差)将在结果输出中产生大的变化。在这种情况下,数值计算的求解结果不可能是准确的。

trans-unit.source: The condition numbers are the reciprocals of the cosines of the angles between the left and right eigenvectors; Large values indicate that the matrix has multiple distinct eigenvalues.
trans-unit.target: 条件数是左、右特征向量之间夹角的倒数,数值大的表示矩阵有多个不同的特征值。

trans-unit.source: The convex hull of a set of points is the minimum convex envelope containing all of the points. Octave has the functions convhull and convhulln to calculate the convex hull of 2-dimensional and N-dimensional sets of points.
trans-unit.target: 一组点的凸包是包含所有点的最小凸包络。八度具有函数 convhull 和 convhulln 来计算二维和N维点集的凸包。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the vector field can be given by the arguments <var>x</var>, <var>y</var>, <var>z</var> or <var>x</var>, <var>y</var> respectively.
trans-unit.target: 向量字段的坐标可以分别由参数 <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> ， <var>z</var> 或 <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> 给出。

trans-unit.source: The coordinates of the vector field can be given by the arguments <var>x</var>, <var>y</var>, <var>z</var> or <var>x</var>, <var>y</var> respectively. <var>v</var> calculates the scalar component of the angular velocity vector in direction of the z-axis for two-dimensional input. For three-dimensional input the scalar rotation is calculated at each grid point in direction of the vector field at that point.
trans-unit.target: 向量字段的坐标可以分别由参数 <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> ， <var>z</var> 或 <var>x</var> ， <var>y</var> 给出。 <var>v</var> 为二维输入计算z轴方向上角速度矢量的标量分量。对于三维输入，将在每个网格点上沿该点的矢量场方向计算标量旋转。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding default value <var>default</var> may be any Octave value, .e.g., double, struct, cell array, object, etc. Or, if <var>pref</var> is a cell array of strings then <var>default</var> must be a cell array of values with the same size as <var>pref</var>.
trans-unit.target: 相应的默认值 <var>default</var> 可以是任何八度值，例如double，struct，单元格数组，对象等。或者，如果 <var>pref</var> 是字符串的单元格数组，则 <var>default</var> 必须是与 <var>pref</var> 大小相同的值的单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding value <var>val</var> may be any Octave value, .e.g., double, struct, cell array, object, etc. Or, if <var>pref</var> is a cell array of strings then <var>val</var> must be a cell array of values with the same size as <var>pref</var>.
trans-unit.target: 对应的值 <var>val</var> 可以是任何八度值，例如double，struct，单元格数组，对象等。或者，如果 <var>pref</var> 是字符串的单元格数组，则 <var>val</var> 必须是与 <var>pref</var> 大小相同的值的单元格数组。

trans-unit.source: The current axes is the default target for graphics output. In the case of a figure with multiple axes, gca returns the last created axes or the last axes that was clicked on with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当前轴是图形输出的默认目标。对于具有多个轴的图形， gca 返回最后创建的轴或用鼠标单击的最后一个轴。

trans-unit.source: The current figure is the default target for graphics output. If multiple figures exist, gcf returns the last created figure or the last figure that was clicked on with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 当前图形是图形输出的默认目标。如果存在多个图形，则 gcf 返回最后创建的图形或用鼠标单击的最后一个图形。

trans-unit.source: The current graphic toolkits produce very similar graphic displays, but differ in their capability to display unusual text and in their ability to print such text. In general, the "tex" interpreter (default) is the best all-around performer for both on-screen display and printing. However, for the reproduction of complicated text formulas the "latex" interpreter is preferred. The "latex" interpreter will not display symbols on-screen, but the printed output will be correct. When printing, use one of the standalone options which provide full access to LaTeX commands.
trans-unit.target: 当前的图形工具包产生非常相似的图形显示，但是它们显示异常文本的能力和打印此类文本的能力不同。通常， "tex" 解释器（默认）对于屏幕显示和打印都是最佳的全能工具。但是，对于复制复杂的文本公式，首选 "latex" 解释器。的 "latex" 解释器将不显示在屏幕上的符号，但打印输出将是正确的。打印时，请使用 standalone 选项之一，该选项提供对LaTeX命令的完全访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The current installation directory can be retrieved by typing
trans-unit.target: 当前的安装目录可以通过键入

trans-unit.source: The current object of a figure is the object that was last clicked on. It is stored in the "CurrentObject" property of the target figure.
trans-unit.target: 图形的当前对象是最后单击的对象。它存储在目标图形的 "CurrentObject" 属性中。

trans-unit.source: The current plotting mode can be changed by using either "auto" or "manual" as the argument.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过使用 "auto" 或 "manual" 作为参数来更改当前绘图模式。

trans-unit.source: The current state can be determined via page_screen_output.
trans-unit.target: 当前状态可以通过 page_screen_output 确定。

trans-unit.source: The current version of Octave executes in a graphical user interface (GUI). The GUI hosts an Integrated Development Environment (IDE) which includes a code editor with syntax highlighting, built-in debugger, documentation browser, as well as the interpreter for the language itself. A command-line interface for Octave is also available.
trans-unit.target: 当前版本的Octave在图形用户界面(GUI)中执行。GUI包含一个集成开发环境(IDE),其中包括一个带语法高亮的代码编辑器、内置调试器、文档浏览器以及语言本身的解释器。Octave的命令行界面也是可用的。

trans-unit.target: Exif标准所定义的图像创建日期和时间,即是文件被更改的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The date vector contains the following fields: current year, month (1-12), day (1-31), hour (0-23), minute (0-59), and second (0-61). The seconds field has a fractional part after the decimal point for extended accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 日期向量包含以下字段:年份、月份(1-12)、日期(1-31)、小时(0-23)、分(0-59)和秒(0-61)。秒字段在小数点后有一个小数部分,以提高精确度。

trans-unit.target: 星期几以1–7编号，第一天为星期日。

trans-unit.target: 方法的默认访问权限是 public 。

trans-unit.source: The default action of accumarray is to sum the elements with the same subscripts. This behavior can be modified by defining the func function. This should be a function or function handle that accepts a column vector and returns a scalar. The result of the function should not depend on the order of the subscripts.
trans-unit.target: accumarray 的默认操作是对具有相同下标的元素求和。可以通过定义 func 函数来修改此行为。这应该是接受列向量并返回标量的函数或函数句柄。函数的结果不应取决于下标的顺序。

trans-unit.source: The default action of accumdim is to sum the subarrays with the same subscripts. This behavior can be modified by defining the func function. This should be a function or function handle that accepts an array and a dimension, and reduces the array along this dimension. As a special exception, the built-in min and max functions can be used directly, and accumdim accounts for the middle empty argument that is used in their calling.
trans-unit.target: accumdim 的默认操作是对具有相同下标的子数组求和。可以通过定义 func 函数来修改此行为。这应该是接受数组和维度并沿该维度缩小数组的函数或函数句柄。作为特殊的例外，内置的 min 和 max 函数可以直接使用，而 accumdim 会考虑在调用它们时使用的中间空参数。

trans-unit.source: The default mode when test is called from the command line is interactive. In this mode, tests will be run until the first error is encountered, or all tests complete successfully. In batch mode, all tests are run regardless of any failures, and the results are collected for reporting. Tests which require user interaction, i.e., demo blocks, are never run in batch mode.
trans-unit.target: 从命令行调用 test 时的默认模式是交互式的。在这种模式下，将运行测试，直到遇到第一个错误，或者所有测试成功完成。在批处理模式下，所有测试都会运行，无论是否失败，都将收集结果以进行报告。需要用户交互的测试（即演示块）永远不会以批处理模式运行。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 17 which is the minimum necessary for the lossless saving and restoring of IEEE-754 double values; For IEEE-754 single values the minimum value is 9. If file size is a concern, it is probably better to choose a binary format for saving data rather than to reduce the precision of the saved values.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是17,这是IEEE-754双值无损保存和恢复所需的最小值;对于IEEE-754单值,最小值是9。如果担心文件大小,最好选择二进制格式保存数据,而不是降低保存值的精度。

trans-unit.source: The default value is " " (a single space).

trans-unit.source: The default value is "-text" (Octave’s own text-based file format). See the documentation of the save command for other choices.

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 "octave-workspace"

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1000 ，但可以被环境变量 OCTAVE_HISTSIZE 覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty character string, but may be overridden by the environment variable OCTAVE_HISTCONTROL.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串，但可以被环境变量 OCTAVE_HISTCONTROL 覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The default value is false.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为假。

trans-unit.source: The default value is normally "less", "more", or "pg", depending on what programs are installed on your system. See Installation.
trans-unit.target: 默认值通常是 "less" ， "more" 或 "pg" ，具体取决于系统上安装了哪些程序。请参阅安装。

trans-unit.source: The default value is taken from the environment variable EDITOR when Octave starts. If the environment variable is not initialized, EDITOR will be set to "emacs".
trans-unit.target: 八度启动时，默认值来自环境变量 EDITOR 。如果未初始化环境变量，则将 EDITOR 设置为 "emacs" 。

trans-unit.source: The default value is true. If this option is disabled Octave will store diagonal matrices as full matrices.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 "true",如果该选项被禁用,Octave将把对角线矩阵存储为全矩阵。如果这个选项被禁用,Octave将把对角线矩阵作为全矩阵存储。

trans-unit.source: The default value is true. If this option is disabled Octave will store permutation matrices as full matrices.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为true。如果这个选项被禁用,Octave将以全矩阵的形式存储排列矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The default value is true. If this option is disabled Octave will store ranges as full matrices.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是 "true"。如果禁用该选项,Octave将以全矩阵的形式存储范围。

trans-unit.source: The default value of orient is "col". If orient is "col", u may be a matrix and j an index vector resulting in the QR factorization of a matrix B such that B(:,j) gives u and B(:,j) = [] gives A. Notice that the latter case is done as a sequence of k insertions; thus, for k large enough, it will be both faster and more accurate to recompute the factorization from scratch.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 orient 是 "col" 。如果 orient 是 "col" ， u 可以是基质和 j 导致矩阵的QR分解的指标向量 B 使得B（:, j ）给出 u 和B（:, j ）= []给出 A 。注意，后一种情况是按k个插入序列完成的；因此，对于足够大的k，从头重新计算因式分解既更快又更准确。

trans-unit.target: <var>origin</var> 的默认值是轴对象的中心，该对象是 <var>h</var> 的父级。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <var>t</var> is 0.

trans-unit.source: The dependencies between the nodes of a Cholesky factorization can be calculated in linear time without explicitly needing to calculate the Cholesky factorization by the etree command. This command returns the elimination tree of the matrix and can be displayed graphically by the command treeplot (etree (A)) if A is symmetric or treeplot (etree (A+A')) otherwise.

trans-unit.source: The diagonal and permutation matrices are special objects in their own right. A number of operations and built-in functions are defined for these matrices to use special, more efficient code than would be used for a full matrix in the same place. Examples are given in further sections.
trans-unit.target: 对角线和换元矩阵本身就是一个特殊的对象。我们为这些矩阵定义了一些操作和内置函数,以使用特殊的、比在同一地方使用全矩阵更有效的代码。在后面的章节中给出了一些例子。

trans-unit.source: The diagonal of L is modified so that row (and column) sums are preserved even when elements have been dropped during the factorization. The relationship preserved is: A * e = L * L' * e, where e is a vector of ones.
trans-unit.target: 修改 L 的对角线，以便即使在分解期间删除元素时也保留行（和列）总和。保留的关系为： A * e = L * L' * e ，其中e是1的向量。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box is a figure object with properties as recommended for a dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 对话框是一个图形对象,具有对话框推荐的属性。

trans-unit.source: The dialog is displayed "modal" which means it prevents users from interacting with any other GUI element until the dialog has been closed.

trans-unit.source: The eigenvalues are optionally ordered along the diagonal according to the value of opt. opt = "a" indicates that all eigenvalues with negative real parts should be moved to the leading block of S (used in are), opt = "d" indicates that all eigenvalues with magnitude less than one should be moved to the leading block of S (used in dare), and opt = "u", the default, indicates that no ordering of eigenvalues should occur. The leading k columns of U always span the A-invariant subspace corresponding to the k leading eigenvalues of S.
trans-unit.target: 特征值可以根据 opt 的值沿对角线进行排序。 opt = "a" 表示所有具有负实部的特征值都应移至 S 的前导块（用于 are ）， opt = "d" 表示所有大小小于1的特征值应移至S的前导块 S （用于 dare ），并且 opt = "u" （默认值）指示不应发生特征值排序。 U 的前 k 列始终跨越 A 不变子空间，该子空间对应于 k S 的k个前导特征值。

trans-unit.source: The expression boolean1 is evaluated and converted to a scalar using the equivalent of the operation all (boolean1(:)). If it is false, the result of the overall expression is 0. If it is true, the expression boolean2 is evaluated and converted to a scalar using the equivalent of the operation all (boolean2(:)). If it is true, the result of the overall expression is 1. Otherwise, the result of the overall expression is 0.
trans-unit.target: 计算表达式 boolean1 ，并使用等效于 all (boolean1(:)) 的操作将其转换为标量。如果为false，则整个表达式的结果为0。如果为true，则对表达式 boolean2 求值，并使用等价于 all (boolean2(:)) 的操作将其转换为标量。如果为true，则整体表达式的结果为1。否则，整体表达式的结果为0。

trans-unit.source: The expression boolean1 is evaluated and converted to a scalar using the equivalent of the operation all (boolean1(:)). If it is true, the result of the overall expression is 1. If it is false, the expression boolean2 is evaluated and converted to a scalar using the equivalent of the operation all (boolean2(:)). If it is true, the result of the overall expression is 1. Otherwise, the result of the overall expression is 0.
trans-unit.target: 使用与操作 all (boolean1(:)) boolean1 （:)）等效的表达式来评估表达式 boolean1 并将其转换为标量。如果为true，则整个表达式的结果为1。如果为false，则对表达式 boolean2 求值，并使用等价于 all (boolean2(:)) boolean2 （:)）的操作将其转换为标量。如果为true，则整体表达式的结果为1。否则，整体表达式的结果为0。

trans-unit.source: The expressions D \ M and M / D perform inverse scaling. They are equivalent to solving a diagonal (or rectangular diagonal) in a least-squares minimum-norm sense. In exact arithmetic, this is equivalent to multiplying by a pseudoinverse. The pseudoinverse of a rectangular diagonal matrix is again a rectangular diagonal matrix with swapped dimensions, where each nonzero diagonal element is replaced by its reciprocal. The matrix division algorithms do, in fact, use division rather than multiplication by reciprocals for better numerical accuracy; otherwise, they honor the above definition. Note that a diagonal matrix is never truncated due to ill-conditioning; otherwise, it would not be of much use for scaling. This is typically consistent with linear algebra needs. A full matrix that only happens to be diagonal (and is thus not a special object) is of course treated normally.
trans-unit.target: 表达式 D \ M 和 M / D 执行逆缩放。它们等效于在最小二乘最小范数意义上求解对角线（或矩形对角线）。在精确算术中，这等效于乘以伪逆。矩形对角矩阵的伪逆再次是具有互换尺寸的矩形对角矩阵，其中每个非零对角元素都用其倒数代替。实际上，矩阵除法确实使用除法而不是乘以倒数，以获得更好的数值精度。否则，它们遵循上述定义。注意，对角矩阵永远不会因病态而被截断；否则，它对缩放没有太大用处。这通常与线性代数需求一致。当然，仅碰巧是对角线（因此不是特殊对象）的完整矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The expressions I(p,:) and I(:,p) are permutation matrices.
trans-unit.target: 表达式 I(p,:) 和 I(:,p) 是置换矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The fields of the structure s are "type", "handle", "properties", "children", and "special".
trans-unit.target: 结构 s 的字段是 "type" ， "handle" ， "properties" ， "children" 和 "special" 。

trans-unit.source: The fifth and sixth arguments, <var>lb</var> and <var>ub</var>, contain lower and upper bounds on <var>x</var>. These must be consistent with the equality and inequality constraints <var>g</var> and <var>h</var>. If the arguments are vectors then <var>x</var>(i) is bound by <var>lb</var>(i) and <var>ub</var>(i). A bound can also be a scalar in which case all elements of <var>x</var> will share the same bound. If only one bound (lb, ub) is specified then the other will default to (-<var>realmax</var>, +<var>realmax</var>).
trans-unit.target: 第五和第六个参数 <var>lb</var> 和 <var>ub</var> 包含 <var>x</var> 的上下边界。这些必须与等式和不等式约束 <var>g</var> 和 <var>h</var> 一致。如果参数是向量，则 <var>x</var> （i）由 <var>lb</var> （i）和 <var>ub</var> （i）约束。边界也可以是标量，在这种情况下， <var>x</var> 的所有元素将共享相同的边界。如果仅指定一个边界（lb，ub），则另一个将默认为（ <var>realmax</var> ，+ <var>realmax</var> ）。

trans-unit.source: The fifth argument is optional, and may be used to specify a set of times that the DAE solver should not integrate past. It is useful for avoiding difficulties with singularities and points where there is a discontinuity in the derivative.
trans-unit.target: 第五个参数是可选的,可以用来指定DAE求解器不应该集成过去的次数。这对于避免奇点和导数中存在不连续的点的困难是有用的。

trans-unit.source: The figure will be minimally moved to be entirely visible on the screen, with a 30 pixel extra padding from the sides of the screen. This is the default value if none is provided.
trans-unit.target: 人物将被最小化移动,使其在屏幕上完全可见,并在屏幕两侧增加30像素的填充。如果没有提供,这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: The file filename is read and parsed according to format. The function behaves like strread except it works by parsing a file instead of a string. See the documentation of strread for details.
trans-unit.target: 读取文件 filename 并根据 format 进行解析。该函数的行为类似于 strread ,只是它通过解析文件而不是字符串来工作。有关详细信息，请参见 strread 的文档。

trans-unit.source: The file identifier corresponding to the input or output stream of the process is returned in <var>fid</var>.
trans-unit.target: 与该过程的输入或输出流相对应的文件标识符以 <var>fid</var> 返回。

trans-unit.source: The file identifiers for the input and output streams of the subprocess are returned in <var>in</var> and <var>out</var>. If execution of the command is successful, <var>pid</var> contains the process ID of the subprocess. Otherwise, <var>pid</var> is -1.
trans-unit.target: 子流程的输入和输出流的文件标识符以 <var>in</var> 和 <var>out</var> 返回。如果命令执行成功，则 <var>pid</var> 包含子进程的进程ID。否则， <var>pid</var> 为-1。

trans-unit.source: The file is opened in binary read/write ("w+b") mode and will be deleted automatically when it is closed or when Octave exits.
trans-unit.target: 该文件以二进制读/写（ "w+b" ）模式打开，并且在关闭或退出Octave时将自动删除。

trans-unit.source: The file to compile or link. Recognized file types are:
trans-unit.target: 要编译或链接的文件。认可的文件类型有:

trans-unit.source: The filename <var>script</var> can be a bare, fully qualified, or relative filename and with or without a file extension. If no extension is specified, Octave will first search for a script with the
trans-unit.target: 文件名 <var>script</var> 可以是裸文件，完全限定文件或相对文件名，并且可以带有或不带有文件扩展名。如果未指定扩展名，Octave将首先使用

trans-unit.source: The filename used when saving the plot figure.
trans-unit.target: 保存剧情图时使用的文件名。

trans-unit.source: The filter string can also contain a semicolon separated list of filter extensions. Example: uigetfile ({"*.gif;*.png;*.jpg", "Supported Picture Formats"})
trans-unit.target: 过滤器字符串还可以包含以分号分隔的过滤器扩展列表。示例： uigetfile ({"*.gif;*.png;*.jpg", "Supported Picture Formats"})
